014package org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement;
018import java.lang.reflect.Type;
019import java.util.Arrays;
020import java.util.HashSet;
021import java.util.Objects;
022import java.util.Set;
023import java.util.function.Function;
024
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiCache;
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiCaches;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiConfig;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.CollectionCollectors;
030
031/**
032 * Utility class for type qualifiers supported by Jdbi core.
033 */
034public class Qualifiers implements JdbiConfig<Qualifiers> {
035    private static final JdbiCache<AnnotatedElement[], Set<Annotation>> QUALIFIER_CACHE = JdbiCaches.declare(
036            elements -> elements.length == 1 ? elements[0] : new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList(elements)),
037            (Function<AnnotatedElement[], Set<Annotation>>) Qualifiers::getQualifiers);
038    private static final JdbiCache<AnnotatedElement, QualifiedType<?>> QUALIFIED_TYPE_CACHE = JdbiCaches.declare(
039            type -> QualifiedType.of((Type) type).withAnnotations(getQualifiers(type)));
040    private ConfigRegistry registry;
041
042    public Qualifiers() {}
043
044    @Override
045    public void setRegistry(ConfigRegistry registry) {
046        this.registry = registry;
047    }
048
049    public <ELEM extends AnnotatedElement & Type> QualifiedType<?> qualifiedTypeOf(ELEM type) {
050        if (registry == null) {
051            return QualifiedType.of(type).withAnnotations(getQualifiers(type));
052        } else {
053            return QUALIFIED_TYPE_CACHE.get(type, registry);
054        }
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Returns the set of qualifying annotations on the given elements.
059     * @param elements the annotated elements. Null elements are ignored.
060     * @return the set of qualifying annotations on the given elements.
061     */
062    public Set<Annotation> findFor(AnnotatedElement... elements) {
063        if (registry == null) {
064            return getQualifiers(elements);
065        }
066        return QUALIFIER_CACHE.get(elements, registry);
067    }
068
069    private static Set<Annotation> getQualifiers(AnnotatedElement... elements) {
070        return Arrays.stream(elements)
071                .filter(Objects::nonNull)
072                .map(AnnotatedElement::getAnnotations)
073                .flatMap(Arrays::stream)
074                .filter(anno -> anno.annotationType().isAnnotationPresent(Qualifier.class))
075                .collect(CollectionCollectors.toUnmodifiableSet());
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public Qualifiers createCopy() {
080        return new Qualifiers();
081    }
082}
